name: Jikkyou J.League Perfect Striker
overview: Jikkyou J.League Perfect Striker is the first game in the series for the Nintendo 64. The game has a J.League license and it includes all the teams and players from the 95-96 season. Later the game was adapted as Jikkyou World Soccer 3, which is better known as International Superstar Soccer 64 in the west.
